sen.j: 『五代帝王物語』（ごだいていおうものがたり）は、鎌倉時代後期に書かれた編年体の歴史物語である。
sen.e: Godai Teio Monogatari is a historical tale which was written in the late Kamakura period and arranged in chronological order.

sen.j: 題名の「五代」とは、後堀河天皇・四条天皇・後嵯峨天皇・後深草天皇・亀山天皇の各天皇を指す。
sen.e: The word 'Godai' included in the title refers to Emperor Gohorikawa, Emperor Shijo, Emperor Gosaga, Emperor Gofukakusa, and Emperor Kameyama.

sen.j: また、のちに伏見天皇となる伏見天皇の存在（後深草天皇の子、亀山天皇の皇太子（後宇多天皇）の即位後、後深草上皇の働きかけで皇太子に立てられた）を知りながら、その存在を過小に書いていることから、著者を亀山天皇とその子孫である大覚寺統を支持していたと見る向きもある。
sen.e: On the other hand, there is a view that the author was somebody who supported Emperor Kameyama and his descendants, Daikakuji-to (Imperial lineage starting with Emperor Kameyama), because the author did not pay much attention to Emperor Fushimi (a son of Emperor Gofukakusa; after the enthronement of the Crown Prince of Emperor Kameyama, he was made a new Crown Prince by retired Emperor Gofukakusa), although the author knew that he would be an Emperor later.
